name: Arizona Arthritis & Rheumatology Associates, P.C.
address: Multiple locations including Phoenix, Glendale, Mesa, Chandler, Tucson, and more
description: This practice has numerous rheumatologists, including Dr. Joonhee Lim (originally from South Korea), Dr. Saima Chohan (of Pakistani descent), Dr. Amer Al-Khoudari (from Syria), Dr. Romy Cabacungan (from the Philippines), and Dr. Nikila Kumar. They offer comprehensive care for a wide range of rheumatologic conditions

name: Dr. Chian Kwoh, MD
address: 2800 E Ajo Way Bldg 100, Tucson, AZ 85713 and 535 N Wilmot Rd Ste 101, Tucson, AZ 85711
description: Dr. Kwoh is a board-certified rheumatologist who practices in Tucson, Arizona. He is fluent in English and Chinese and has been practicing for over 39 years

name: Dr. Mian Rizwan, MD
address: 8140 E Cactus Rd Ste 720A, Scottsdale, AZ 85260
description: Dr. Rizwan graduated from Hamdard University in Karachi, Pakistan. He is board-certified and uses state-of-the-art technology to diagnose and treat patients with various rheumatic conditions. He is fluent in English, Urdu, Hindi, and Punjabi

name: Dr. Nehad Soloman, MD
address: 9520 W Palm Ln Ste 220, Phoenix, AZ 85037
description: Dr. Soloman is a board-certified rheumatologist and internal medicine specialist with extensive experience. He is known for his professionalism and community engagement

name: Dr. Vijayabhanu Mahadevan, MD
address: 13943 N 91st Ave Bldg 1, Peoria, AZ 85381 and 12665 W Smokey Dr, Ste 140, Surprise, AZ 85378
description: Dr. Mahadevan completed her Rheumatology fellowship at the National Institutes of Health in Maryland. She has practiced in Arizona for over 9 years and is board-certified in Internal Medicine and Rheumatology

name: Dr. Mona Amin, DO
address: 9305 W Thomas Rd Ste 505, Phoenix, AZ 85037 and 1958 Commerce Center Circle, Prescott, AZ 86301
description: Dr. Amin is a rheumatologist with expertise in conditions like Rheumatoid Arthritis and Osteoporosis. She is highly rated and is part of Arizona Arthritis & Rheumatology Associates

name: Dr. Ruchi Shah, MD
address: 6220 W. Bell Road, Suite 100, Glendale, AZ 85308
description: Dr. Shah is a board-certified rheumatologist specializing in autoimmune and inflammatory conditions, with a focus on rheumatology-dermatology overlap disorders. She is originally from Vadodara, India, and is fluent in Gujarati and Hindi

name: Dr. Waseem Allabban, MD
address: 1100 S Dobson Rd Suite #102, Chandler, AZ 85286
description: Dr. Allabban is the founder of Arizona Rheumatology Consultants and is dedicated to the diagnosis and treatment of arthritis and autoimmune diseases. He earned his medical degree from the University of Damascus in Syria

name: Dr. Mohammad Shakir, MD
address: 1100 S Dobson Rd Suite #102, Chandler, AZ 85286
description: Dr. Shakir received his medical degree from Dow Medical College Karachi and completed his rheumatology fellowship at the University of Arizona

name: Dr. Rajbir Gulati, MD
address: 12665 W Smokey Dr, Ste 140, Surprise, AZ 85378
description: Dr. Gulati co-founded Arthritis Consultants PC with Dr. Mahadevan, focusing on patient-centered care with compassion and expertise in rheumatology
